column4: couple of questions... 1. I can't change the default video player for any type of file even when I right-click and choose open with other app.           2. I get no preview for any audio files when I hover over them, but the option is turned on.        Any ideas on either question?
to  change the app use right click - properties -open with tab, to the other question i think you may be missing the required plugins/libraries to playback those files and thats why it fails
that took care of problem number 1, thanks. Any ideas on problem 2?
whats the type of file it doenst work with?
you may need to install the packages mpg321 and vorbis-tools for the audio preview to work
still not working. would a logout/login be required as well?
i know it requried those packages in earlier version, maybe they switched the preview to gstreamer, do those files playback in totem?
maybe you need to install the gstreamer-mad plugin
maybe theres a bug filed for that in launchpad, might  be worth looking for
okay, checking to see if it's 64bit specific.
... figured it out. Apparently the preview uses rythmbox, and by default, the audio was muted in rythmbox.
